version_description:
• Fixed a couple of crashes related to "Cast Shadow".
• Fixed a crash in "Focus" and "Zoom Blur" tools.
• Other minos bug fixes.

If you like using Superimpose X, kindly review or rate us on the App Store, that really helps!

• Fixed a bug that caused weird edges around masked images imported from Mask Library.
• Other minos bug fixes.

If you like using Superimpose X, kindly review or rate us on the App Store, that really helps!

• Added a new "Clone Stamp" tool under Editor->Brush.
• You can now show or hide a layer. Tap on a layer on the layer stack viewer to access this menu option.
• You can now "Replace image but keep mask" for a layer. This option is also under the layer stack view's layer menu.
• A new tool has been added in the Color Wheel panel to pick a color from the screen.

If you like using Superimpose X, kindly review or rate us on the App Store, that really helps!

• Fixed a critical bug where the magnifier used to get stuck while using the new color picker tool.

If you like using Superimpose X, kindly review or rate us on the App Store, that really helps!

Thanks for using Superimpose X! If you like the app, please rate or review us on the App Store.

We have made number of improvements in this update...

● An option to match the colors of one layer to that of another. Find this option by tapping the active layer in the Layer Stack.
● Shrink or expand a mask. Find this under Mask->Blur/Shrink. This comes very handy to remove the unwanted outlines around a masked object.
● You can now duplicate a project.
● It is now easier to delete a project.
● 8 layers support extend to iPad too (iPad Pro and above).
● Better ordering of the photo albums. "Favorite" album is now just next to the "Camera Roll". So now you do not need to keep looking for it.
● A new mask viewing mode - B&W. You can now view the mask in black and white too.
● Regular brush and Smart Brush now shares the same brush size.
● Bug fixes.

Many of you have requested us for better video tutorials for sometime now. And so, we have started releasing some detailed app tutorials. In this update you can find the first set of 5 tutorial videos under the information section. Hope you will like them.

Besides that we have fixed a couple of bugs and added a new tool under Editor->Tools->Mask Outline to create an outline on the mask.

If you are enjoying playing with the app, please do review or rate us on the App Store, we will really appreciate that.

● Added a new option called “Resize Base”. Using this you can change the base size of a project, the size at which the final image is exported.
● Now you can crop an individual layer in the crop tool section.
● The new “Crop Layer” tool has an option to automatically crop a layer to the bounding box of the unmasked area.
● Fixed a bug that sometimes used to make the mask settings get stuck on the screen.
● A new tutorial video about Mask Library has been added.

If you like the app, please do review or rate us on the App Store, we will really appreciate that.

● We have changed engine under the hood.
● Added a new "Retouch" brush tool under "Editor->Brush". You can now do your blur, saturation, desaturation etc. using this brush.
● Added a new tutorial video on Filters.
● And of course, bug fixes.

If you are loving Superimpose X, please rate or review us on the App Store. We will really appreciate it.

● We have changed engine under the hood.
● Added a new "Retouch" brush tool under "Editor->Brush". You can now do your blur, saturation, desaturation etc. using this brush. (iPhone 6 and above)
● Added a new tutorial video on Filters.
● Fixed a bug from the last update that affected some older devices.

If you are loving Superimpose X, please rate or review us on the App Store. We will really appreciate it.

● We have changed engine under the hood.
● Added a new "Retouch" brush tool under "Editor->Brush". You can now do your blur, saturation, desaturation etc. using this brush. (iPhone 6 and above)
● Added a new tutorial video on Filters.
● Fixed a bug from the last update that affected some older devices.

If you are loving Superimpose X, please rate or review us on the App Store. We will really appreciate it.

● We have changed engine under the hood.
● Added a new "Retouch" brush tool under "Editor->Brush". You can now do your blur, saturation, desaturation etc. using this brush. (iPhone 6 and above)
● Added a new tutorial video on Filters.
● Fixed some more bugs from the last update that affected some devices.

If you are loving Superimpose X, please rate or review us on the App Store. We will really appreciate it.

● A new tool "Light Wrap" has been added. Yes, now you can do light wrap on your iPhone and iPad and you are gonna love it!
● Added an option to defocus the center instead of the edges in the "Focus" editor tool.
● Fixed a couple of bug on iOS 12.

If you like using Superimpose X, please do review/rate us on the App Store. We will really appreciate it.

● A new tool "Light Wrap" has been added. Yes, now you can do light wrap on your iPhone and iPad and you are gonna love it!
● Added an option to defocus the center instead of the edges in the "Focus" editor tool.
● Fixed a couple of bug on iOS 12.

If you like using Superimpose X, please do review/rate us on the App Store. We will really appreciate it.

● Light Wrap is now available on all devices.
● Fixed the bug that made the "Outlines" black.

If you like using Superimpose X, please do review/rate us on the App Store. We will really appreciate it.

● Fixed a bug that made the app unresponsive for long time at start on iOS 12.
● Improved text and image masking tools.
● Improved text tool UI.
● Added 4:5 and 5:4 crop ratios.
● Bug fixes and other improvements.

If you like using Superimpose X, please do review/rate us on the App Store. We will really appreciate it.

● Bug fixes and other improvements.

If you like using Superimpose X, please do review/rate us on the App Store. We will really appreciate it.

● A new "Lens Blur" tool.
● You can now rotate and add gradient to rectangular and elliptic masking tools.
● A new option in settings to enable tap indicators so that you could use it to create video tutorials.
● Bugs fixed.

● You can now export your project as PSD file, preserving all the layers.
● You can also share your projects through iCloud, AirDrop, DropBox, email or any other cloud service that you use.
● Masks can now be exported via iCloud, AirDrop, email and other cloud services.
● Improved elliptic and rectangular masks. You can now single tap to switch between rotate and normal mode. An option to rotate orthogonally in rotate mode.
● Bug fixes.

● Now you can access more than a million beautiful HD Pixabay stock photos from inside Superimpose X! And they are all royalty free! Use them to create amazing edits.

● We also fixed the bug that sometimes made the "Done" button disappear in the text tool.

If you like using Superimpose X, please write a review on the App Store. Or just leave a rating, we will really appreciate it!

● Now you can access more than a million beautiful HD Pixabay stock photos from inside Superimpose X! And they are all royalty free! Use them to create amazing edits.

● Several important bug fixes.

If you like using Superimpose X, please write a review on the App Store. Or just leave a rating, we will really appreciate it!

● Improvements in Recover and Outline tools.
● Other minor improvements.

If you like using Superimpose X, please write a review on the App Store. Or just leave a rating, we will really appreciate it!

● Superimpose X got smarter with AI. It can now mask out people from your photos automatically! Find it out under Mask->Mask tool->Auto Mask People.

● Are your old sessions taking too much space but you do not want to delete them yet? Well, prune them. An option to shrink the size of sessions by pruning them.

If you like using Superimpose X please rate or review us on the App Store. That really helps.

● Superimpose X got smarter with AI. It can now mask out people from your photos automatically! Find it out under Mask->Mask tool->Auto Mask People.
● Are your old sessions taking too much space but you do not want to delete them yet? Well, prune them. An option to shrink the size of sessions by pruning them.

If you like using Superimpose X please rate or review us on the App Store. That really helps.

• Performance improvements and bug fixes.
• You can now use custom image size while picking color/gradient layer.
• The app is now available in Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Spanish and Russian languages.

If you like using Superimpose X please rate or review us on the App Store. That really helps.

• Bug fixes and improvements.

If you like using Superimpose X please rate or review us on the App Store. That really helps!

• Improved photo and sessions browser.
• Improved text tool.
• You can now move a layer more precisely. Tap and hold in the Transform section to activate this mode.

If you like using Superimpose X please rate or review us on the App Store. That really helps.

• Improved photo and sessions browser.
• Improved text tool.
• You can now move a layer more precisely. Tap and hold in the Transform section to activate this mode.

If you like using Superimpose X please rate or review us on the App Store. That really helps.

• Improved text tool.
• You can now move a layer more precisely. Tap and hold in the Transform section to activate this mode.

If you like using Superimpose X please rate or review us on the App Store. That really helps.

• Improved photo and sessions browser.
• Improved text tool.
• You can now move a layer more precisely. Tap and hold in the Transform section to activate this mode.
• Bug fixes.

If you like using Superimpose X please rate or review us on the App Store. That really helps.

● You can now re-edit text in a layer even after applying the text.
● You can now add multiple texts in a layer.
● A new shape drawing tool with tons of shapes (under Editor->Brushes).
● New light effects for creating light leaks, northern light, bokeh and flares (under Editor->Effects).
● New glitch effects to create fake glitches in your photo (under Editor->Effects).
● On supported devices, you can now save photos in high quality HEIC format, which is the default now. So, you can save photos much faster while consuming less space even for photos with transparency.
● Multitasking is now enabled on iPad.
● You can now drag and drop a photo into the app on iPad.
● Focus, Lens, Motion and Zoom blur tools are new moved to Effects section under Editor.

If you like using Superimpose X, please review or rate it in the App Store. We appreciate it a lot!

● You can now re-edit text in a layer even after applying the text.
● You can now add multiple texts in a layer.
● A new shape drawing tool with tons of shapes (under Editor->Brushes).
● New light effects for creating light leaks, northern light, bokeh and flares (under Editor->Effects).
● New glitch effects to create fake glitches in your photo (under Editor->Effects).
● On supported devices, you can now save photos in high quality HEIC format, which is the default now. So, you can save photos much faster while consuming less space even for photos with transparency.
● Multitasking is now enabled on iPad.
● You can now drag and drop a photo into the app on iPad.
● Focus, Lens, Motion and Zoom blur tools are new moved to Effects section under Editor.

If you like using Superimpose X, please review or rate it in the App Store. We appreciate it a lot!
